sentences.en: "There’s nothing I can tell you about how [this or] any other incidents were or are handled, " CIA historian David Robarge said.
sentences.cn: “关于[这一或]或任何其他事故是如何处理的，我没有什么可以告诉你的，”中央情报局历史学家大卫·罗巴尔说。

sentences.en: A spokesman for the CIA would not comment on the details of the still - classified program.
sentences.cn: CIA的一位发言人不愿对这个还处于机密的项目的细节发表评论.

sentences.en: Chicken Anemia Virus ( CAV ) is the pathogen of Chicken Infectious Anemia ( CIA ).
sentences.cn: 鸡贫血病毒 ( chickenanemia virus,CAV ) 是鸡传染性贫血病(chicken infectiousanemia,CIA ) 的病原体.

sentences.en: Conclusion SGTBJ can clear the TNF - α in the serum of CIA rat model.
sentences.cn: 结论桑桂通痹剂对CIA大鼠模型血清TNF - α可起到明显的清除作用.
他被临时调到中央情报局工作去了。

sentences.en: Officials of the CIA depend heavily on electronic mail to communicate with each other.
sentences.cn: 中情局官员之间的联系在很大程度上依赖电子邮件。

sentences.en: Only a mere handful of people within the CIA about the scope and details the program.
sentences.cn: 仅仅只有CIA内的少数人,知道实验的范围和细节.

sentences.en: Results Tongbiling could induce apoptosis of synovial cell in CIA rats.
sentences.cn: 结果通痹灵组CIA大鼠滑膜细胞的凋亡数明显增加.

sentences.en: Results: As compared with those of Group M, both CIA rat ankle diameter and arthritis index improved ( P < 0.05 )
sentences.cn: 结果: 与M组相比, CIA大鼠关节直径、关节炎指数评分均有改善 ( P<0.05 ).

sentences.en: Sokolov : Who's there? You're the man from the CIA are you doing here?
sentences.cn: 谁在那里? 你是CIA的那个人,你到这里干什么?
有人供出了一名CIA特工的身份.

sentences.en: Splenic lymphocytes from CIA rats were transferred into normal Lewis rats.
sentences.cn: 将cia大鼠脾淋巴细胞转移至同系正常大鼠,观察发病情况.

sentences.en: The challenge for the CIA is to excel at human spying.
sentences.cn: CIA的挑战就是要超越人类侦探的范围.

sentences.en: The CIA also interested in neuropeptides; these have profound effects when administered within a conditioning paradigm.
sentences.cn: CIA也对神经肽极有兴趣, 这在条件训练的范例中也有明显的效果.

sentences.en: The CIA was ordered to cease all drug testing.
sentences.cn: CIA被命令停止所有的药物测试.

sentences.en: The Methods: Used are typical CIA and FBI tactics like Cointelpro tactics.
sentences.cn: 所使用的方法是典型的CIA和FBI战术像是反间计.

sentences.en: They brainwashed the captured pilot into believing he was a CIA agent.
sentences.cn: 他们迫使那个被俘的飞行员相信他是个中央情报局特务。

sentences.en: We saw last of the current CIA prisoners turned over to the Defense Department.
sentences.cn: 我们看到目前CIA犯人移交给国防部.

trans.tran_en: The CIA is the government organization in the United States that collects secret information about other countries
